_source.text: 7. As for whether or not to wait or take the LSAT now: I think over-preparation is better than under-preparation, so in that respect I would wait for the next cycle if I were feeling uncertain about my all-important LSAT score.

text: 7. As for whether or not to wait or take the LSAT now: **I** think over-preparation **is** **better** **than**
under-preparation, so in that **respect** **I** would wait for the **next** cycle if **I** were feeling uncertain about my all-important LSAT score.

_source.text: "A Firing Line Debate: Resolved: That the Republican Party Is Better Able to Run the Country for the Next Four Years than the Democratic Party"

text: "A Firing Line Debate: Resolved: That the **Republican** **Party** **Is** **Better** Able to Run the Country for the **Next** Four Years than the **Democratic** **Party**"
